entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
